Sentece: Botulinum neurotoxins (BoNT) are some of the most toxic proteins known, with a human LD50 of ~1 ng/kg.
Title: Monoclonal Antibody Combinations Prevent Serotype A and Serotype B Inhalational Botulism in a Guinea Pig Model.
Name: Botulinum Toxin Type B

Sentece: Equine antitoxin has a half-life in circulation of less than 1 day and is limited to a treatment rather than a prevention indication.
Title: Monoclonal Antibody Combinations Prevent Serotype A and Serotype B Inhalational Botulism in a Guinea Pig Model.
Name: Botulinum Toxin Type B

Sentece: The development of monoclonal antibodies (mAbs) may represent an alternative therapeutic option that can be produced at high quantities and of high quality and with half-lives of >10 days.
Title: Monoclonal Antibody Combinations Prevent Serotype A and Serotype B Inhalational Botulism in a Guinea Pig Model.
Name: Botulinum Toxin Type B
